Html:
When looking at Gear Trinket 1 and Trinket 2 comparisons, the list of items and values are different.  Is this intended?

For example, on my Trinket 1 best in slot according to Rawr is Defender's code with 9112.84 overall.   On Trinket 2, Darkmoon Card: Greatness is best in slot with 14127.56.

 

Same thing with Fingers..  Example, Finger1 best in slot is Brann's Signet Ring with 9973.xx overall.  On Finger2 best in slot is The Leviathan's Coil with 1193x.xx overall.  (Can't see past edge of screen, thats why xx)

 

The overall values for these items are different.. Example Finger1 2nd best is Fate's Clutch with 9709.01 but on Finger2  Fate's Clutch is 9951.06.  Trinket1 2nd best is Valor Medal of the First War with value 7915.09 and Trinket2 Valor Medal of the First War with value 7522.47.
Yes, that is intended, and accurate. The item in Finger1 affects the value of items in Finger2, and vice versa.
